thread.title: Hanna Andersson Clearance Sale: Organic Cotton Pajamas Only $15 (Regularly $46) & More
thread.title_full: Hanna Andersson Clearance Sale: Organic Cotton Pajamas Only $15 (Regularly $46) & More

author: Erica (Silly Sidekick)
title: Hanna Andersson Clearance Sale: Organic Cotton Pajamas Only $15 (Regularly $46) & More
text:
Through February 20th, hop on over to Hanna Andersson where they are hosting a President’s Day Sale and offering 20% off everything (prices as marked) and Clearance Prices starting at just $10! Please note that shipping starts at $5.95 and increases based on order size.
I spotted quite a few of their very popular Kids Long John Pajamas In Organic Cotton on sale for $15 (regularly up to $46!) – scroll down the page to view the full selection.

I also spotted Girls’ Dresses for only $10-$15 (regularly $49), Long-Sleeve Shirts for only $10 (regularly $32) and Leggings for only $10 (regularly $29).
And did you know that Hanna Andersson offers up an unconditional guarantee? If you’re unhappy with a product at any time for any reason, just bring or send it back and they’ll refund the purchase price or replace the item.
Need winter accessories? Head this way…
